text: Dieter Laser (17 February 1942 – 29 February 2020) was a German actor.The New York Times He is known to English speaking audiences for his roles as Mantrid in Lexx,Lexx Domain - Cast Prof. Otto Blaettchen in The Ogre, Dr. Josef Heiter in The Human Centipede (First Sequence) and Bill Boss in The Human Centipede 3 (Final Sequence). == Death == Dieter Laser died twelve days after his 78th birthday on 29 February 2020. His death was not announced until a message to his official Facebook page was posted on 9 April 2020.RIP DIETER LASER: HUMAN CENTIPEDE ACTOR HAS PASSED AWAY[R.I.P. ‘The Human Centipede’ Star Dieter Laser Has Passed Away] ==References== ==Other websites== * * *Official Facebook site of Dieter Laser Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:German movie actors Category:German television actors Category:People from Kiel
title: Dieter Laser
